definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: But only now are Japanese companies starting to feel the real pinch.
sentences.chinese: 不过仅仅是到了日本公司才感到切肤之痛。

sentences.english: He was rather cut up after his wife passed away.
sentences.chinese: 太太身故后，他感到切肤之痛。

definition: to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
engraved in one's heart and carved in one's bones (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives/undying gratitude
to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead
lit. as if having a fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom)/fig. very upset and needing to express one's displeasure
